channel.title: Searching on NOWHERESVILLE
channel.description: Recent content in Searching on NOWHERESVILLE

item.title: Searching 搜索算法
item.description: Binary Search Python code #1 def binarySearch(arr, target): low, high = 0, len(arr)-1 while low <= high: mid = (low + high)//2 if target == arr[mid]: return mid elif target < arr[mid]: high = mid - 1 else: low = mid + 1 return None Python code #2 Bad! def binarySearch(arr, target): if len(arr) == 0: return None mid = len(arr)//2 if arr[mid] == target: return mid elif arr[mid] > target: try: return binarySearch(arr[:mid], target) except TypeError: return None else: try: return binarySearch(arr[(mid+1):], target) + mid + 1 except TypeError: return None Python code #3
